content: pattern was available on the knit 1 website only this domain is now for sale photo may be seen on page 58 of the *knit 1 winter 2007/2008* issue **pattern description from *knit 1 winter 2007/2008* ** a friendly octopus has a spiraling single-crochet body i-cord tentacles and inky store-bought safety eyes faith hale worked it appropriately in the cotton-ease color lake from lion brand yarn **notions ** two 12mm solid black safety eyes small amount of polyester stuffing **note ** this pattern is worked in rounds to form a spiral
